author: wsjcom
title: The Next Big Things in Business Computing
text:
Every company looks for ways to boost productivity. Antonio Neri, president and chief executive of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co., which was born from the 2015 split of Hewlett-Packard, spoke about products in the HPE pipeline with Sara Castellanos, a reporter for The Wall Street Journalâ€™s CIO Journal. Edited excerpts follow.
Memory-centric MS. CASTELLANOS: What technology are you most excited about that will add business value in the near future?
